data.meta_description: Remembering Jeevan, the inimitable stalwart villain of Hindi cinema, on his 100th birth anniversary today. Jeevan(24-10), born as Omkar Nath Dhar was famous for playing the role of Narad Muni in mythological films of the 1950s. He has played the role of Narad Muni in more than 60 films. Later he played the role of a villain in many films of the 60s, 70s and 80s. His son Kiran Kumar is also an actor.  www.bollywoodirect.com  #bollywood #Bollywoodirect
